text: Pete Smith may mean: * Pete Smith (announcer), Australian radio and television announcer * Pete L. Smith, Major League Baseball pitcher, 1962–1963 * Pete Smith (baseball, born 1966), Major League Baseball pitcher, 1987–1998 * Peter K Smith, founder of Cavalier Yachts, boat-builder, sailor, and marine anchor designer * Pete Smith (movie producer) * Pete Smith (actor)
title: Pete Smith
